item.title: Declining Number of Americans Applying for Portugal's Golden Visa Program
item.description: Declining Number of Americans Applying for Portugal’s Golden Visa Program Portugal’s Golden Visa program, which allows foreigners to obtain residency in exchange for investing in the country, was popular with Americans during the pandemic. However, the number of Americans applying for the program has declined in recent months.
